content.question: Compare how two different AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries vary in terms of the selection process of their executives and of the restrictions that exist on executive power. In your response, you should do the following:(A) Describe the role of the head of government.(B) Describe the selection process for the head of government in two AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries.(C) Explain the extent to which executive power is formally constrained in the two AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries described in (B).
